data.oai_dc:dc: Methane fluxes from an Alaskan rich fen (APEX)

Methane fluxes were collected at APEX rich fen using the static chamber method during the summer of 2005 and summer 2006. The field site uses a full-factorial water table (flooded or raised, lowered or drained, and control plots, as well as a moisture gradient) by warming manipulation experiment (warmed, unwarmed) which are reflected in the plot column and the warming column, respectively.
